Test.Name: GetServices: no Advanced Security service
Test.Description: The DUT do not support Advanced Security service

Test.Name: GetServices: no response
Test.Description: The DUT does not send GetServicesResponse

Test.Name: GetServices: fault message
Test.Description: The DUT sends Fault messge to GetServicesRequest

Test.Name: UploadPassphrase: empty Passphrase ID
Test.Description: The DUT sends incorrect UploadPassphraseResponse with empty Passphrase ID

Test.Name: UploadPassphrase: no response
Test.Description: The DUT does not send UploadPassphraseResponse

Test.Name: UploadPassphrase: fault message
Test.Description: The DUT sends fault message to UploadPassphraseRequest

Test.Name: UploadPassphrase: specified fault message 1
Test.Description: The DUT sends env:Receiver\ter:Action\ter:MaximumNumberOfPassphrasesReached fault message to UploadPassphraseRequest

Test.Name: UploadPassphrase: specified fault message 2
Test.Description: The DUT sends env:Sender\ter:InvalidArgVal\ter:BadPassphrase fault message to UploadPassphraseRequest

Test.Name: DeletePassphrase: no response
Test.Description: The DUT does not send DeletePassphraseResponse

Test.Name: DeletePassphrase: fault mnessage
Test.Description: The DUT sends fault message to DeletePassphraseRequest

Test.Name: DeletePassphrase: specified fault mnessage 1
Test.Description: The DUT sends env:Receiver\ter:Action\ter:PassphraseDeletionFailed fault message to DeletePassphraseRequest

Test.Name: DeletePassphrase: specified fault mnessage 1
Test.Description: The DUT sends env:Sender\ter:InvalidArgVal\ter:PassphraseID fault message to DeletePassphraseRequest

Test.Name: GetAllPassphrases: created Passphrase is in the list
Test.Description: DUT returns deleted Passphrase in GetAllPassphrasesResponse

Test.Name: GetAllPassphrases: created Passphrase is in the list (without Alias)
Test.Description: DUT returns deleted Passphrase (without Alias) in GetAllPassphrasesResponse

Test.Name: GetAllPassphrases: created Passphrase is in the list (wrong Alias)
Test.Description: DUT returns deleted Passphrase (with wrong Alias) in GetAllPassphrasesResponse

Test.Name: GetAllPassphrases: no response
Test.Description: The DUT does not send GetAllPassphrasesResponse

Test.Name: GetAllPassphrases: fault message
Test.Description: The DUT sends fault message to GetAllPassphrasesRequest

Test.Name: GetServiceCapabilities: MaximumNumberOfPassphrases is missed
Test.Description: MaximumNumberOfPassphrases capability is missed in GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse

Test.Name: GetServiceCapabilities: MaximumNumberOfPassphrases = 0
Test.Description: MaximumNumberOfPassphrases capability is equal to 0 in GetServiceCapabilitiesResponse
